name: Bushko: in factory
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to jump
  • X to interact in menu

How to play: 

Simple platformer mechanics, jump on enemies to kill them but there is just a few places in power plant with sunlight so be careful not to spend to much time in darkness. Plants need sunlight to live!

Short lore: Bushko lived in a peaceful plant village. Until evil people built power plant right next to Bushko's village. They polluted everything around but that wasn't enough they started to take away your friends to make them work in power plant. It's time for revenge! Save your friends and shut down that power plant! Jump on enemies in your path and push your way to confront the evil boss . 

This game was made for GBJam10, theme was "plant".  And it was quite a challenge since I did not make art myself until now. I wanted to make a lot of features and content but man this 10 days felt like 10 hours. :) Look forward to publish post jam version of this game.

Credits:

As the rules of GBJam10 are I made everything for this game myself using:
